item.title: How to fix hanging gem install on a fresh OSX Lion install
item.description: I’ve now tried to use gem install <package> on two fresh installs of OSX Lion on a Macbook Pro 13” 2011 and Macbook Pro 15” 2012. Both have suffered from the same issue of the gem installer hanging. This was my symptom. $ gem install cocoapods ERROR: While executing gem ... (Gem::FilePermissionError) You don't have write permissions into the /Library/Ruby/Gems/1.8 directory.</pre> The strange thing was, if this was solely an issue with permissions, then it should not take almost three minutes to give that error message.
